amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for salaries and expenses at the Department of Treasury by $1.75 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for salaries and expenses at the Department of Treasury by $1.75 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Royce.
